## StateType.getFocusableChildren() method

Gives the editor information about the children of the plugin (e.g. to build the document tree)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFocusableChildren(state: T): FocusableChild[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | <code>T</code> | current state |

<b>Returns:</b>

`FocusableChild[]`

an array of children, each described by an object with an `id`
